alert.note: Alert for Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 10 at 8:16PM MDT until further notice by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Montana, including the following county, West and Southwest Valley. * WHEN...Until 945 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Some low-water crossings are impassable. River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 809 PM MDT, Trained weather spotters reported flooding across the area. - Beaver Creek Road on the Larb Creek south of Saco, Milk River Road on Beaver Creek west of Hinsdale, and Billingsly Road on Antelope Creek west of Glasgow are flooding. Flooding is also occurring on other roads. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
